metadata.title: CVE-2024-11079 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible-Core. This vulnerability allows attackers tobypass unsafe content protections using the hostvars object to referenceand execute templated content. This issue can lead to arbitrary codeexecution if remote data or module outputs are improperly templated withinplaybooks.

criterions.comment: ansible package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
